questions.question: What is the difference between the span and div elements?
questions.answer: Span is an inline element and div is a block level element
questions.opt1: Span can contain only texts and div can contain text and any other elements
questions.opt2: Span is a block element and div is an inline element
questions.opt3: Span is an inline element and div is a block level element
questions.opt4: We can have many span elements but only one div element in a web page

questions.answer: To hide an element from assistive technologies such as screen readers
questions.opt1: To specify the role of an element in the accessibility tree
questions.opt2: To indicate that an element is currently selected

What does the 'async' attribute do when added to a script tag in HTML?
questions.answer: Specifies that the script should be executed asynchronously
questions.opt1: Specifies that the script should be executed synchronously
questions.opt2: Specifies that the script should be executed on page load
questions.opt3: Specifies that the script should be executed after the page has finished loading
questions.opt4: Specifies that the script should be executed asynchronously
